CONCLUSION: Preliminary objection dismissed (Article 34 - Victim);Violation of Article 10 - Freedom of expression -{General} (Article 10-1 - Freedom of expression);No violation of Article 14 - Prohibition of discrimination (Article 14 - Discrimination);Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage;Pecuniary damage;Just satisfaction)
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;David Thór Björgvinsson;Egbert Myjer;Elisabet Fura
TEXT: “ Transfer to another jurisdiction shall mean the transfer to a jurisdiction one degree lower than the one in which the person concerned is currently working , for a minimum term of service , if :
a ) he / she undermines the honour and dignity of the judiciary and respect for his / her own position as a judge by his / her conduct and relations .
b ) if he / she by his / her action and conduct gives the impression that he / she can not perform his / her duty in a correct and an impartial manner .
